trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around November 10th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 7:44 pm Arizona time, I exited my apartment to the West. When I reached the parking lot I immediately turned to the left (South) and witnessed a very large glowing object streaking across the sky from South towards the Southwest. The object left a sizable trail and was the largest object I have ever seen streaking through the sky. It had some characteristics of the recent Russion meteor but the object I observed travelled slower and had a larger main body. It disappeared out of sight behind another building.
Summary: Very large fireball like object streaking through sky
